org.jboss.gravia.runtime.embedded.spi

Class BundleContextAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.gravia.runtime.embedded.spi.BundleContextAdaptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleContext, BundleReference

    public final class BundleContextAdaptor
extends Object
implements BundleContext
    Bundle implementation that delegates all functionality to the underlying Module.
    Since:
    27-Sep-2013
    Author:
    thomas.diesler@jboss.com
